tool_description: Recommends appropriate water purification techniques based on contamination risks, available resources, and urgency to ensure safe drinking water.

water_volume_liters.description: Volume of water to purify (0.1 to 50 liters)

urgency_level.description: Treatment urgency: immediate, urgent, standard, thorough

available_fuel_energy.description: Energy for heating: none, limited, adequate, abundant

water_clarity.description: Visual water quality: clear, slightly_cloudy, cloudy, very_cloudy, murky

ambient_temperature_c.description: Current air temperature in Celsius (-40 to 50)

time_available_minutes.description: Available time for purification (1 to 300 minutes)

error_messages: Empty contamination types: Must specify at least one suspected contamination type.
Empty purification methods: Must specify at least one available purification resource.
Volume out of range: Water volume must be between 0.1 and 50 liters.
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [immediate, urgent, standard, thorough].
Invalid fuel availability: Use one of [none, limited, adequate, abundant].
Invalid clarity assessment: Use one of [clear, slightly_cloudy, cloudy, very_cloudy, murky].
Temperature out of range: Temperature must be between -40 and 50 degrees Celsius.
Time out of range: Available time must be between 1 and 300 minutes.
usage: Specify contamination concerns, available purification resources, water volume, urgency, and energy availability. Tool provides prioritized treatment recommendations with step-by-step procedures.

estimated_treatment_time.description: Expected total treatment time in minutes

effectiveness_rating.description: Treatment effectiveness: excellent, good, adequate, minimal
